title: FinTech SaaS Platform
description: A comprehensive financial management platform for small businesses
problem: Small businesses struggled with fragmented financial tools and manual processes
solution: Built an all-in-one platform with automated accounting, invoicing, and reporting
results: Scaled from 100 to 10k+ users in 6 months

title: E-commerce Mobile App
description: Cross-platform mobile shopping app with AR features
problem: Traditional e-commerce apps lacked engaging user experiences and slow performance
solution: Developed a React Native app with AR product visualization and optimized performance
results: Increased conversions by 40% with AR features

title: Healthcare Management System
description: HIPAA-compliant patient management and telemedicine platform
problem: Healthcare providers needed secure, compliant digital solutions for patient management
solution: Built a secure platform with EHR, appointment scheduling, and telehealth features

title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
description: Dashboard for monitoring business metrics with real-time updates
problem: Companies lacked real-time visibility into key business metrics
solution: Created a customizable dashboard with WebSockets and data visualization

title: Education Platform
description: Interactive learning platform with video courses and assessments
problem: Traditional LMS lacked engagement features and personalization
solution: Built a modern platform with interactive content, gamification, and AI recommendations
results: Reduced server costs by 40% with optimization

title: API Gateway & Microservices
description: Scalable microservices architecture with API gateway
problem: Monolithic architecture couldn't scale and was difficult to maintain
solution: Designed and implemented microservices with API gateway and service discovery
